resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103833</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103833</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206266</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Ocean and Coastal Response and Restoration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ozean und Küstenantwort und Wiederherstellung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Océan et réponse et restauration côtières</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Oceano e resposta e restauração litorais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Oceano e risposta e ripristino litoranei</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ωκεάνιες και παράκτιες απάντηση και αποκατάσταση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Océano y respuesta y restauración costeras</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">allows students to learn about oil spills and hazardous chemical accidents through experiments that can be done at home, in the classroom, or for a science project.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlaubt Kursteilnehmern, über Ölstreuungen und 
gefährliche chemische Unfälle durch Experimente zu erlernen, die ein
Wissenschaft Projekt zu Hause, im Klassenzimmer oder für erfolgt 
werden können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">permet à des étudiants de se renseigner sur des 
flaques d'huile et des accidents chimiques dangereux par les 
expériences qui peuvent être faites à la maison, dans la salle de 
classe, ou pour un projet de la science.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">permite que os estudantes aprendam sobre 
derramamentos do óleo e acidentes químicos perigosos com as 
experiências que podem ser feitas na HOME, na sala de aula, ou para 
um projeto da ciência.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">permette che gli allievi imparino circa le cadute 
dell'olio e gli incidenti chimici pericolosi con gli esperimenti che 
possono essere fatti nel paese, nell'aula, o per un progetto di 
scienza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επιτρέπει στους σπουδαστές για να μάθει για τις 
διαρροές πετρελαίου και τα επικίνδυνα χημικά ατυχήματα μέσω των 
πειραμάτων που μπορούν να γίνουν στο σπίτι, στην τάξη, ή για 
ένα πρόγραμμα επιστήμης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">permite que los estudiantes aprendan sobre 
derramamientos del aceite y accidentes químicos peligrosos con los 
experimentos que se pueden hacer en el país, en la sala de clase, o 
para un proyecto de la ciencia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206266</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103833</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/ocean-and-coastal-response-and-restoration</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
